titleStmt.title: [Two notable sermones lately preached at Pauls Crosse Anno 1544]
titleStmt.author: Chedsey, William.
Scott, Cuthbert, d. 1565.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Johannes Herford, at the costs and charges Robert Toye dwellynge in Paules church yarde, at the sygne of the Bell,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Jmprynted at London in Aldersgate strete :

notesStmt.note: Title from STC (2nd ed.), imprint from colophon.
Second sermon is by Cuthbert Scott--Cf. DNB XVII, 953.
Imperfect: preliminaries lacking. Begins with B₁.
Reproduction of original in: Lambeth Palace Library.
